description: Rayleigh expresses interest in meeting Luffy after witnessing the chaos at the auction house and saving Camie. This is their first formal meeting.

evolutionInEpisode.changeDescription: Rayleigh introduces himself to Luffy, stating he wanted to meet the young captain whose name he had heard.

significance: Establishes the connection between the legendary first mate of the Pirate King and the future Pirate King, setting up Luffy's future Haki training.

quotes.speaker: Silvers Rayleigh
quotes.text: I wanted to meet you, Monkey D. Luffy.
quotes.context: First meeting at the auction house

description: Robin formally introduces Trafalgar Law to Luffy at the auction house, establishing their first acknowledged connection.

evolutionInEpisode.changeDescription: Robin identifies Law to Luffy as a fellow pirate and Supernova.

significance: First formal introduction between two future allies who will form a major alliance in the New World.

description: Kid observes and comments on Luffy's reckless actions at the auction house, acknowledging his reputation.

evolutionInEpisode.changeDescription: Kid acknowledges that the rumors about Luffy being crazy are true after witnessing him punch a Celestial Dragon.

significance: Establishes Kid's view of Luffy as a legitimate rival among the Supernovas.

quotes.speaker: Eustass Kid
quotes.text: The rumors are true - that guy is one crazy pirate.

description: Usopp accidentally falls on and knocks out Celestial Dragon Saint Rosward, making him an enemy of the World Government.

evolutionInEpisode.changeDescription: Usopp crashes through the roof and accidentally knocks Rosward unconscious.

significance: Another Straw Hat directly harms a Celestial Dragon, escalating the incident and ensuring severe consequences.

description: Rayleigh uses Conqueror's Haki to knock out Shalria when she attempts to kill Camie.

evolutionInEpisode.changeDescription: Rayleigh stops Shalria from killing Camie by knocking her unconscious with Haki.

significance: Rayleigh directly intervenes against a Celestial Dragon, showing his willingness to oppose the World Government.
